attributes.action: Make ALL items available for sale in UK display country of origin.
attributes.additional_details: I'm a sole trader who relies on buying items as part of my job, many of which I'd rather buy from local businesses and sellers, I try to avoid buying products made in china and other countries due to patchy or poor quality, if this information is available before purchasing it will make it easier to filter out items I would normally avoid.
attributes.background: I'd like to see all products that are sold in the UK be made to clearly display where the product is made, on packaging, online listings and displays so a more informed decision can be made before purchasing.
